title: Glass
info: Glass is crafted from different types of sand at a Furnace. Glass can be placed as a block and is an ingredient in producing various items.
stat:
Type
BlockCrafting material
Placeable (1 wide × 1 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
Rarity00*
Research100 required
